body.name: Australian Botanical Soap, Goat's Milk & Soya Bean Oil Pure Plant Oil Soap, 6.8 oz. 193g Bars - 8 Count - Packaging May Vary

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 35 mins
features: TRIPLE MILLED NATURAL SOAP BARS FROM AUSTRALIA - Crafted responsibly with sustainable palm oil and enriched with organic shea butter. Each bar is created with a triple milling process for a long-lasting, rich, creamy lather that leaves the skin feeling silky smooth.

RICH GOAT MILK - Goat milk soap is suited for anyone looking for a more delicate, cleansing soap bar. It is especially great for those with sensitive skin because of its gentle moisturizing and nourishing qualities. These soap bars are blended with natural goat milk from the pristine farmlands of South Eastern Victoria.

SUSTAINABLY SOURCED PLANT OILS - Plant oils sourced from sustainable plantations create a high glycerin content to moisturize the skin and leave it smooth and soft. No SLS, HEDP or EDTA, detergents, or harsh chemicals are ever added to Australian Botanical Soap.

GIVE A BOOST TO YOUR SKINCARE ROUTINE - The tranquil scent of plant oil helps calm the mind and provides a gentle exfoliation, making this soap a must for your daily skincare routine. The long lasting bars rinse off clean and don't leave soap residue behind.
DISCLAIMER - Actual colors of our soap may vary. The amount of discoloration depends on a variety of factors such as light, air, temperature, and age.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Australian Botanical Soap with Goat's Milk & Soya Bean Oil
reviews.reviewText: Dived into the Australian Botanical Soap experience, and I'm floating on a cloud of pure luxury. This isn't just soap; it's a skincare symphony.Let's talk about these triple-milled natural soap bars from down under. Crafted responsibly with sustainable palm oil and a touch of organic shea butter, these babies undergo a triple milling process. Result? A long-lasting, rich, creamy lather that kisses your skin with silkiness.Now, the star of the show – rich goat milk straight from the pristine farmlands of South Eastern Victoria. This soap isn't just for cleaning; it's a delicate, moisturizing experience. Perfect for sensitive skin, it's a gentle touch of nourishment.Sustainably sourced plant oils add to the magic. High glycerin content? Check. Moisturized, smooth, and soft skin? Double-check. No harsh chemicals, detergents, or funky additives – just pure goodness in Australian Botanical Soap.But it's not just about the body; it's a boost for the soul too. The tranquil scent of plant oils calms the mind, and the gentle exfoliation makes this soap a daily skincare essential. Plus, these bars don't play games – they rinse off clean, leaving no soap residue behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing soap at an amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using a natural soap made by another company, I wont name names but lets just use an alias: Big Foot, MD. Their soaps are nice, smell great BUT they generally cost over $8/bar and last a week (im 6ft 200lb man). I needed to make a switch so I found Australian Botanicals, read about their soaps, they offer a variety of real natural soaps I purchased an 8 pack of hefty bars (I think weigh 3x's as much as Big Foots) for $22! I've been on my first bar for over a month! Do the math, waaaay cheaper than Big Foots. The goats milk bar has a creamy, milky, somewhat vanilla sent. Not "manly" like big foots but smells great. I haven't tried their others (yet). This soap lathers great, it feels like you're rubbing a smooth, creamy lather of whipped cream on you. My skin feels great throughout the day too. A+++ for this company making a great product at a fair price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have a hard time finding a soap I can use on my face that will not only remove makeup, but will also not make my face break out. I have used Dr B’s peppermint bar soap for years, but lately it’s just too expensive. Five dollars a bar for soap! It’s too pricey for me.I had to find a new soap that I could afford. So, the search was on. I read through so many reviews for so many different soaps 🧼 I ordered a few different brands and types, but they just didn’t do what I needed. There was one that smelled lovely and made my skin soft, but I’d have to scrub my face nearly raw to get it to take off my makeup💄, particularly mascara. I don’t use much makeup when I do apply it, so it was disappointing. And that must mean the soap didn’t get the rest of the stuff off my face and body that I collect throughout the day.I saw this Australian soap and the reviews were promising, so I took another chance at another new soap. The bars are very large and I still haven’t even gotten the first bar I used halfway down. This box is going to last a very long time. It leaves my skin feeling soft. There isn’t very much of a scent and I’m glad about that because I’m sensitive to strong aromas.I have oily skin on my face on my T-Zone and this soap actually makes my skin a bit dry, but I use a facial moisturizer so that solves that. The one day I didn’t use the moisturizer, my face quickly softened and the dryness disappeared. I haven’t broken out from it and since I’ve been using this every day for a few weeks, I know I won’t break out.It removes my makeup with minimal “scrubbing” and it was so inexpensive! And there were a lot of bars in the box! Doesn’t get any better than that. Hopefully in the case you order this it’ll work well for you too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I ordered in June, it's mid November and am on my last bar. Family of 3, all of us shower daily.The smell is very mild, but fresh. I don't notice the scent lingering on my skin. I like this because it doesn't clash with any other scents, like deodorant or whatever I'm using to moisturize my skin.It worked great on my summer skin, and was wonderful through the change in season. My skin usually gets dry patches when it starts getting cold, but I didn't get any this year.The bar is long lasting and holds its shape well. Stays right on its little soap dish and doesn't make a mess.It's a great price and a great product. I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure if it is just me. I may have really dry skin. These soaps are good, but I was expecting more moisture, and that it would last longer. I'm not sure what the quantity of goat milk used on this. But to me, it seems almost like a regular soap. The soaps are a very good size, for the price, I think it is a good deal. But again, I guess it is just that my skin is very sensitive and dry. I would recommend it, if you're only looking for a regular soap. Their scent is very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After placing the order, It arrived the next day. I actually respect the fact the package is made out of paper material and not plastic. That tells me they also care for the environment. Best part no harsh chemicals and not tested on animals.I ordered 8 soaps. Upon opening the box immediately a very beautiful, unique aroma was noticed. The soaps are smooth coated with their brand company letters on top, the back says made in Australia and have flower pattern designs on the sides. Definitely well made! It’s not cheap. However, you do get what you pay for. I would say it’s affordable and fair at the current price of $25.99. I wouldn’t buy if it were higher than that. Only if they included more soaps. Anyway, I would recommend buying and trying it out for yourself.

This soap is one of those rare products I wish I'd found years ago because it has worked wonders for my skin. Absolutely love it. I can't even begin to explain how much better this soap is compared to other commercial brands. The only way to truly appreciate this product is to try it.Only issue is it's hard to find. Best to stock up on it when you can. On the plus side, the bars are large and dense, not pumped full of air. They last quite a long time. And they don't overpower with strong odors either.

Excellent soap, but I bought it on Sep 19, 2023 for Can$30.48 and now its Can$64.43 for the same 8 bars of soap!! MORE THAN DOUBLED IN PRICE WITHIN 4 MONTHS!!! Come On NovaBC (Seller), how can you justify this price???
The bars are really big (almost double the size of a Dove soap bar) and very moisturizing. Definitely worth the price, I just wished it lathered a bit more. Otherwise totally recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fabulous, worth it for all skin
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Great endurance. Great lather. Incredible aroma
